attributes.action: Plug In MK3 Doors on trains
attributes.additional_details: Mark 1, 2 and 3 doors on trains like High Speed Trains and touring companies trains should be made into Plug Doors to make the railway a lot safe for the people, bashers window hang and put there life's at risk with this it could save life's and make staff life's a lot more easy on closing doors are the stock is started to become outdated
